attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear priminister we the citizens of england have had enough of being told what to say and what not to do and also wat to put up at our christmas celebrations  i am my self sick of it and as for the troops coming home and marching through luton well that has made my blood boil.
we cant say that . so why can they???
if we done that in one of there countries we would be shot!!!

p.s WHAT HAPPENED TO GREAT BRITAIN
AND FREDOM OF SPEACH.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
